extension.summary: Watch full episodes and clips from your favorite Comedy Central shows.
extension.description: Comedy Central brings you the funniest stuff on the planet. Watch hit shows like Workaholics, Tosh.0, The Daily Show with Trevor Noah, Key and Peele @midnight and Broad City, plus cutting-edge stand-up comedy you won't find anywhere else. Head to CC.com for full episodes, exclusives, previews and more.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, June 2007
extension.news:
[B]v0.0.2[/B] - playlist index fix - strptime workaround
[B]v0.0.1[/B] - first release

extension.summary: Visualizza contenuti di Sky Video Italia
extension.description: Visualizza contenuti video del portale di Sky Italia (video.sky.it). Notizie, sport, intrattenimento e tanto altro.
extension.summary: Show content from Sky Video Italia
extension.description: Show video content from the website of Sky Italia (video.sky.it). News, sport, entertainment and much more.
extension.news:
[B]1.0.1[/B] - added missing logos - code improvements
[B]1.0.0[/B] - first public release - code cleanup

extension.description: A repository of add-ons that nixxo developed for a personal Kodi system

extension.summary: I programmi delle reti Rai e i servizi interattivi
extension.description: I canali radio e tv in diretta, gli ultimi 7 giorni di programmazione, le puntate integrali, i telegiornali. Source: https://github.com/maxbambi/plugin.video.raitv/
extension.summary: The broadcasts of Rai channels and its interactive services
extension.description: Live radio and TV channels, latest 7 days of programming, broadcast archive, news. Source: https://github.com/maxbambi/plugin.video.raitv/

[B]3.6.0[/B] - Fixes for Kodi 19 Matrix

extension.description: Aggiungi manualmente "plugin://script.common.resume.strm.playback/?" nei file STRM davanti all'URL che contengono.
Manually add "plugin://script.common.resume.strm.playback/?" in yout STRM files as a prefix to the URL in them.
